name: breakdown
description: A productivity app for script analysis
author: olaf wendt <olaf@olafwendt.com>

scripts.electron-dev: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3001 && electron ."
scripts.electron-debug: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3001 && electron . --trace-warnings"
scripts.rebuild-sharp: npm rebuild sharp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && npm rebuild sharp --platform=darwin --arch=arm64
scripts.package-mac: npm run rebuild-sharp && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --universal --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package-mac-x64: npm rebuild sharp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --x64 --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package-mac-arm64: npm rebuild sharp --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package-mac-unsigned: CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false npm run build && electron-builder --mac --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package-win-debug: cross-env DEBUG=* ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING=true npm run build && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.yml --debug
